about_the_game:
In "Holiday Motel Simulator," you take on the role of an entrepreneurial owner of a neglected motel, whose goal is to restore its former glory and develop it into a thriving leisure resort. The player's task is to manage every aspect of the motel, starting from renovating dilapidated rooms to ensuring guest satisfaction.

Step into the role of an owner of a neglected motel waiting for a second chance. Begin your adventure from the ground up, planning and executing a comprehensive renovation of the property. From a damaged facade to rusty pipes, every detail affects guests' first impressions. Utilize your renovation skills to revitalize and transform the motel into an oasis of comfort, ready to welcome the most discerning travelers.

After completing the renovation, it's time to give the motel a unique character. You can choose from wide range of furniture and decorations to create interiors tailored to various guest tastes and preferences. Compose perfect rooms to ensure a comfortable stay, and exceptional additions will make your motel stand out in the crowd. Whether it's modern minimalism or rustic charm, the decisions are in your hands!

Ensure guest satisfaction by managing efficient motel operations. Collect feedback, respond to suggestions, and pay attention to every detail to provide unforgettable experiences for travelers. Your decisions will impact the business's development, and each new customer is a new story to be written in the "Holiday Motel Simulator" history. Will your motel become the most popular vacation spot? It depends solely on you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1st gen / Intel Core i5 7th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit or newer
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3rd gen / Intel Core i5 10th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB / NVIDIA RTX 2070 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
